name: Verify Interactive
description: A comprehensive interactive assessment that measures general cognitive ability through engaging, puzzle-like problems.

name: Verify Numerical Reasoning
description: Assesses a candidate's ability to analyze and interpret numerical data, tables, and charts to make business decisions.

name: Verify Verbal Reasoning
description: Evaluates a candidate's ability to understand and analyze written information to draw accurate conclusions.

name: Verify Logical Reasoning
description: Measures a candidate's ability to draw logical conclusions based on given information and identify patterns.

name: Verify Spatial Reasoning
description: Assesses a candidate's ability to visualize, manipulate, and reason with three-dimensional objects.

name: Verify Mechanical Reasoning
description: Evaluates a candidate's understanding of mechanical principles, physical forces, and their applications.

name: Verify G+ C
description: A comprehensive assessment of general intelligence that combines verbal, numerical, and abstract reasoning.

name: Occupational Personality Questionnaire (OPQ)
description: Provides insights into a candidate's preferred behavioral style at work and likely fit with organizational culture.

name: Situational Judgement Test
description: Assesses how candidates would handle typical workplace scenarios, providing insights into their judgment and decision-making.

name: Motivation Questionnaire (MQ)
description: Evaluates what drives and motivates a candidate in the workplace, helping predict engagement and retention.

name: Remote Assessment Monitoring
description: Provides secure remote proctoring for assessments, ensuring test integrity in remote settings.

name: Coding Simulator
description: Evaluates a candidate's programming skills through realistic coding challenges in multiple languages.

name: Sales Assessment
description: Measures a candidate's sales aptitude, including prospecting, relationship building, and closing abilities.

name: Customer Service Assessment
description: Evaluates a candidate's customer service orientation, problem-solving abilities, and communication skills.

name: Call Center Assessment
description: Assesses a candidate's abilities to handle customer calls, multitask, and resolve issues efficiently.

name: Leadership Assessment
description: Evaluates a candidate's leadership potential, including decision-making, team management, and strategic thinking.

name: Digital Skills Assessment
description: Assesses a candidate's proficiency with digital tools, technology concepts, and digital problem-solving.

name: Microsoft Office Assessment
description: Evaluates a candidate's proficiency with Microsoft Office applications including Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.

name: Talent Assessment
description: A holistic assessment that combines cognitive, behavioral, and skills evaluations for a complete candidate profile.

name: Workplace Behavior Assessment
description: Assesses a candidate's understanding of workplace ethics, integrity, and professional conduct.
